embed.description: All-in-one Teamfinder, Friend List & Chat App for League of Legends. It's free and works both on your desktop and phone. Finding new gamers is as easy as swiping right. Set your filters and connect with like-minded people that match your preferences in seconds.

replies.body: Interessant, wie sich um League eine ganze Branche aufbaut. News, Apps und ganze Events nur wegen dem Computerspiel...  überwältigend.
